a.detail:
Ice Dart Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +8 to hit against one target, 2d10 cold damage

e.detail: A 5-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor
e.summary: A 5-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor

i.detail: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor
i.summary: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor

m.detail: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls
m.summary: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls

n.detail: The walls here have been engraved with glowing symbols
n.summary: The walls here have been engraved with glowing symbols

r.detail: The scent of smoke fills the corridor
r.summary: The scent of smoke fills the corridor

u.detail: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into the next dungeon level down
u.summary: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into the next dungeon level down

v.detail: A mouldy odor fills the corridor
v.summary: A mouldy odor fills the corridor

x.detail:
Ball Bearings:
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 10 save or fall prone, creatures moving at half-speed do not need to make the save
x.summary:
Ball Bearings:
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 10 save or fall prone, creatures moving at half-speed do not need to make the save

details.history: The dungeon was created by mind flayers as a lair. It became cursed by the gods, and has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.
